channel.title: Changing .JAG files
channel.description: I am trying to edit some of the sprites for my client. I opened a .JAG file, edited it to my likings then i saved it, it asked me to save it as. Then when i look in my sprites folder i have a INVBACK 0 (JAG file) and a INVBACK 0 (PNG file). How do i make it just replace what is in the .JAG file?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2009, 07:35:24 am[/size][hr]Also, if i try to save it as a .JAG file it says, would you like to replace the existing file INVBACK 0.JAG? i click yes, then it says i was denied acces to change it.

item.title: Changing .JAG files
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Convert it to PNG.
Make a batch file and type:

ren *.jag *.png

Edit the PNG file and convert back with:

ren *.png *.jag

Read full topic
